Text: Sorry for the slow up to start with - it's still better than the original site which was  7-10KB/s!!

Also - You can make this into a bootable USB drive, with the addition of running it in a virtual machine on top of your Windows OS, by using http://www.linuxliveusb.com

It will detect the OS as Android 1.6r2, which works fine.

I don't want to p*** on your parade, but because the torrent download link didn't work (for some strange reason) I've downloaded "android-x86-2.2-generic.iso"from android-x86.org with a 1Mb download speed...

Still want to thank you for bringing this usefull app to my attention.
